name: mermaid-visual-diff
description: Show visual diff of Mermaid flowcharts in Markdown between Git HEAD and current edits

mermaid-visual-diff.addedColor.description: Background color for added nodes/edges (e.g. #e6ffed, lightgreen)

mermaid-visual-diff.addedStroke.description: Stroke color for added nodes/edges (e.g. #2ea043, green)

mermaid-visual-diff.removedColor.description: Background color for removed nodes/edges (e.g. #ffebe9, lightpink)

mermaid-visual-diff.removedStroke.description: Stroke color for removed nodes/edges (e.g. #cf222e, red)
